387.last_action: Reported Printed; referred to State Affairs
387.title: Amends existing law to provide that freedom from discrimination because of sexual orientation or gender identity is a civil right.
387.description: CIVIL RIGHTS -- Amends existing law to provide that freedom from discrimination because of sexual orientation or gender identity is a civil right.

617.last_action: Reported signed by the Speaker & ordered delivered to Secretary of State
617.title: Stating findings of the Legislature and supporting Governor Brad Little and the Idaho Department of Correction in their opposition to the State of Idaho providing gender reassignment surgery to Adree Edmo.
617.description: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTION -- Stating findings of the Legislature and supporting Governor Brad Little and the Idaho Department of Correction in their opposition to the State of Idaho providing gender reassignment surgery to Adree Edmo.
